techniqueRules: Finish with acid or fresh herbs when needed.
substitutions: No garam masala -> cumin + coriander + black pepper
donts: Do not add all spices at end

snippets.text: Indian home comfort should center on masala depth and shared table practicality.
Weeknight Indian profile can shorten simmer while preserving tadka and spice layering.
Punjabi cues: robust onion-tomato masala, warming spices, hearty portions.
South Indian cues: curry leaf tempering, tang, and lighter broth-forward structure.
